headline: AI growth brings new tests for semi-test duopoly
summary: Investing.com -- The semiconductor test (semi-test) market has historically played a key role in enabling greater technological complexity, but it is now attracting heightened attention due to its growing exposure to AI infrastructure—namely GPU testing, Custom ASIC testing, and high-bandwidth memory (HBM) testing.

content.title: AI growth brings new tests for semi-test duopoly
